评论详情: Kind of a retro style, and I love the bright colors. This tshirt fits true to size and kind of a baggy look. Soft and comfortable, it washes well on cold. It is lightweight and soft, and a great style. Fun and trendy look!
This is the type of material that has a "bounce" to it. It is a thick material, loose fit, and comfortable overall. True to size, and great, vibrant colors.

Okay, so I actually got this shirt because it reminds me of my youth (something I'd have worn in high school in the early 90s).  I love it.  It's soft.  It's cotton and spandex (my fave combo).  It's cute.  What more can I ask for.  I'm 5'6", about 150, 34D (VS), 27/28 in jeans, 40-inch hips, and an hourglass.  I got a small.  It fits a bit oversized, as described.

This tshirt is very comfortable with just the right amount of stretch. Oversized look, I ordered an extra large and probably could have worn a large. For reference I'm 5'6 and 180 pounds. Love the colors they are very vibrant. Cute tucked in or left untucked. I would buy again.

This shirt is well made and very comfortable. It fits true to size and ive noticed no changes after washing. I love the colors and stripes. This shirt paired with jeans & converse shoes has quickly become one of my favorite outfits.

The shirt is cute on and true to the online photos. It was a little odd smelling when I first unpackaged it, so I threw it into the wash. It washed and dried fairly well. Overall, it's fine - definitely not a true cotton shirt, but perfect for a casual outfit.

The shirt has a good shape, it's over-sized so if you order your normal size it should already fit like it's oversized. I love the ringer tee style cuffs and the striped pattern. The fabric is a little on the medium weight side for a t-shirt. Since there is 5% elastane, the shirt stretches, but it won't change from its original shape. You can't stretch it out like a 100% cotton t-shirt. So if you like your t-shirts to be really structured, this is a good casual shirt to have.
I am passing this on to someone who needs it. I won't let my Mom use it, not even to sleep in.

评论概述: Nice quality, super soft and comfortable
评论详情: I like this brand, they make good quality items. This top is really cute, it a has knit neckline and cuffs. The material is really soft and comfortable and it runs true to size. I got the green with pink trim, it’s casual and youthful looking. Really like it and highly recommend
I love the fit and it washes up nice. Can match a lot of things too
